title: Daily Reminder Teemo should be reworked into a jungler

replies.body: "A part of you never leaves the jungle." - Omega Scout Teemo

He can be played as one already...?

Low cd ult is great for clearing post-6 fast, can work as wards and traps, and excellent for counter-jungling and baiting. His blinding dart will reduce damage he'll tank in his early clears, his DoT and AS builds will naturally make clears fast, and he has a speedboost for ganks (and his blind will screw the enemy adc over when he ganks bot).

Nidalee could before her changes too.

She has nuke tip spears, I demand nuke tipped shrooms.

Your point, kind sir?

*Tips Fedora*

Hm, maybe his E can deal 150% extra damage against monsters if his early clears are too slow? Or maybe just his mushrooms... or just blinding dart?

I got nothing. He seems fine, but... maybe a little buff? 

*spills spaghetti*

+1 for giggles

*knees week, arms are heavy*

+1 for Eminem reference

*vomit on sweater already*

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3LeKyRWx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-01T22:55:22.951+0000)
>
> He can be played as one already...?
> 
> Low cd ult is great for clearing post-6 fast, can work as wards and traps, and excellent for counter-jungling and baiting. His blinding dart will reduce damage he'll tank in his early clears, his DoT and AS builds will naturally make clears fast, and he has a speedboost for ganks (and his blind will screw the enemy adc over when he ganks bot).

Lots of people can be played in the jungle. But far fewer can be good at it. Teemo isn't a good jungler, it's just vaguely possible for him to take the role. It's still a troll pick though.
Lmao what did I start :D
You paved the way for the future of cap'n teemo
i think we have enough awful squishy non-cc jungles as it is, thx.

Because nidalee and Shyvana are just such AWFUL junglers, amiright?

Kappa

> [{quoted}](name=itsWind,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3LeKyRWx,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-02T00:02:32.456+0000)
>
> i think we have enough awful squishy non-cc jungles as it is, thx.

What's wrong with a jungler being squishy and without CC? Nobody said every jungler had to be a bruiser or tank.

That idea Teemo as jungler came out of nowhere about week ago. And suddenly everyone wants teemo reworked, changed and w/e..

I give 2-3 weeks more and you guys will want teemo to be a Tank.

Give it a rest already.
You've never gone {{item:3068}} tank Teemo in ARAM? It's hilarious.

no.. Didn't try it :)

But it'd give info about my +/- position which wouldn't be too good
Depends on the enemy teamcomp of course. Still, it's funny to watch enemies walking around the spot wondering why their HP is going down.

Jungle teemo rework: 
Passive: While in the jungle, teemo is stealthed. (Otherwise same as regular)
Q: Same
W: Same
E: increases poison damage by an additional 0.xAP per second
R: When used to kill a large monster, the cooldown is imminently refreshed.

:D
'Nam Veteran Teemo?

I think his running should be more like like the opposite of Lee sin slow. U start off running fast and it wears off instead of being consistent speed. 
Decays over time. 
That would help his ganks have an element of surprise. Enough that by the time they notice he can smite them. 
Plus w active is kind of showing its age. Now with so many dash characters etc its harder and harder to escape people with it.

To rework Teemo into the jungle, 2 things needs to happen.

1. His W needs to become his passive.

2. His W needs to be another ability.  Maybe a on command hard CC?  That would be nice.
